content:
Arthur Asuncion

--------------

Origins

I am interested in the issues of creationism, evolution, and intelligent design. I feel that this topic is one of the most important topics in life. I personally believe that this universe and life were designed by an intelligent Creator, and that many hallmarks of design can be empirically found in nature.

Articles:

  • Fine-Tuned For Life (February 2006): This article views fine-tuning as evidence for cosmological design.
  • Darwin or Design? (October 2005): This article gives a broad case for design in nature.
  • World-Renowned Atheist Finds God Through Science (February 2005): This article describes Antony Flew's change of heart.

Project:

  • Analyzing The Origin Of Homochiality In Life: This paper was submitted as a final project for a statistics class (Math 131C) that I took in my 2nd year of undergrad. It discusses whether the feature of homochirality in life could be generated by chance.

Club:

  • iDesign @ UCI: I am part of this student club which seeks to foster friendly discussions on origins. Everybody is welcome to attend iDesign meetings.
